retiredMentions.text: - Use `node scripts/[retired]/l10n-pull` to pull curated overlays from Supabase
- Added allowlist validation script and validated (`scripts/[retired]/validate-sdr-allowlists`).
- `scripts/[retired]/prague-l10n-watch`  do NOT run during CI deploys (race condition on overlay files)
- **Safety:** Does not write to Supabase; pushing overlays remains an explicit separate action (`scripts/[retired]/l10n-push`).
- Status check: `node scripts/[retired]/prague-l10n-status` (best-available by default; add `--strict-latest` to see whats missing for latest)
